name: Focus
flavorText: Grand Mage Chengat, one of the first masters of the Yshari Sanctum, crafted the rings Focus and Restraint to work in conjunction with one another to bolster the user's mental fortitude.
flavorTextHtml: Grand Mage Chengat, one of the first masters of the Yshari Sanctum, crafted the rings Focus and Restraint to work in conjunction with one another to bolster the user's mental fortitude.
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 When you hit with a resource-generating attack or primary skill, deal 50% increased damage for 5 seconds.(2) Set:     
 When you hit with a resource-spending attack, deal 50% increased damage for 5 seconds.
setDescriptionHtml:
